page.title: 18GALA WEEK
page.content: Ratho's Gala is actually a{Gala week in the middle of June.It starts on the Sunday and finishes off with the Gala day on the Saturday.Every year they select a{Gala Queen}from Ratho's primary 7.It was Saron Lease this year who was crowned by her headmistress Mrs.H.Johnston,on the Gala day.She was taken round the village after being crowned,followed by 10 body guards,4 ladies in waiting,15 flower girls,page boy,herald,trumpeter,crown bearer and lastly the Queensferry Pipeband. The{weeks program}was:Sun:Marathon; Mon:Girls 5 aside football; Tues:Boys 5 aside; Wed:Races; Thurs:Fancy dress, pram race,guider race; Fri:Canal jump; Sat:Gala day,Grand Finale Disco for adults.The{Canal jump}in the Gala is the only one in Britain,so the locals want to publicise it more,having a jump for the locals and outsiders.
